GET /api.description: Serves a json object of all available endpoints of the api

GET /api/events.description: By default serves an array of all events, sorted by date ascending. Events can be filtered and sorted with queries

events.title: My event
events.description: This will be a fun event

GET /api/events/:id.description: Serves an object of a single event by its unique id

event.title: Wednesday evening book club
event.description: We will read books and discuss them

DELETE /api/events/:id.description: Deletes an event by its unique id

PATCH /api/events/:id.description: Updates an event by its unique id

exampleResponse.message: Event #4 (Test Event #4) updated title to 'Wednesday evening book club' successfully.

POST /api/events.description: Creates a new event and adds it into the events database

event.title: Tuesday morning yoga class
event.description: A fun yoga class to start your day

exampleResponse.message: Event posted successfully: Tuesday morning yoga class
